Html:
I am running into a roadblock here on the 7th step.

 

 

 

How can I fix this?
Can anyone help me with this? I have been waiting for a response since the 17th.
Do you have SQL Server Express installed? That's the most common cause of this problem.
Yes, I have SQL Server Express 2008 R2 installed, as well as SQL Server Express 2012.

I'm really sorry you're having trouble with that.

There are a variety of reasons why this wouldn't work: http://www.bing.com/search?q=asp.net+web+site+administration+tool+unable+to+connect+to+sql+database

Honestly, since this is an issue with an ASP.NET feature, the best way to get help is by posting on the ASP.NET site forums here: http://forums.asp.net/25.aspx/1?Security

It's likely a problem with your database connection string, so I'd include the contents of your web.config in your post.

- Jon

that's my problem too, eventhough i'm using this connection string;

  <connectionStrings>    <add name="MusicStoreEntities"    connectionString="Data Source=|DataDirectory|MvcMusicStore.sdf"    providerName="System.Data.SqlServerCe.4.0"/>  </connectionStrings>

I can't create a new user.. even at

it is working
